title: House of the Lararium of Achilles
description: The so-called "House of the Lararium of Achilles" (I ,6 ,4) lies on the Via dell'Abbondanza. Excavated in 1912 and 1913, it is also known as the "House of the Ilion Sanctuary".
names: House of the Lararium of Achilles

properties.title: OSM location of the so-called "Casa del Larario di Achille"
